page: ME60353: Knowledge Based Systems In Engineering

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction to expert systems – Definition, Need for expert systems, Methods of developing expert system – offline training/learning & on-line training/learning Tools for developing expert systems – Hard Computing vs. Soft Computing, Fuzzy Set Theory, Fuzzy Logic Controllers (FLC), Neural Network (NN) Controllers – back propagation network, SOM, radial basis function networks, recurrent neural networks etc., Learning/optimisation tools – traditional (direct search and gradient based) and non-traditional (genetic algorithms (GAs), simulated annealing etc.) techniques. Combined techniques of soft computing – GA-FLC, GANN, NN-FLC, GA-FLC-NN Some Applications
page: ME60353: Knowledge Based Systems In Engineering

title: Student Opinion
text: Contents of these playlists - 1 and 2 is taught in the classes. Watching those videos at 2X will be enough preparation for exam. Just make sure not to make calculation mistakes in exam. This is a good course to take. Less Load. Easy grade scoring. Grading is absolute, just take care of that.
